attributes.action: Do not re-open colleges or schools before March 8th, it’s unsafe to do so.
attributes.additional_details:
You should do it so we can all be safe and control the virus, kids may catch it faster so it isn't safe to reopen just yet. Please rethink this and reopen them maybe in mid April to may. 

This virus may be controlled and ended soon, IF we keep schools shut for a further amount of time. Student are currently working from home so they’re not missing out on any learning.
attributes.background: Hello GOV, you should not open schools on march 8th since the virus is still high. I suggest you guys should keep it closed until april-may just to control the virus, if you do reopen now the virus will be uncontrollable and more family’s will lose their children/family members.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Keep schools closed until May
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/573621

Don’t re-open schools until all staff have been vaccinated
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572419
